Title: C++ with DS and Algorithms
Description: Become an expert in conceptualising Self Driving Cars, Web Applications and more. Learn one of the most powerful and portable programming language, C++ and become eligible to apply for the positions at companies such as Google, Microsoft, Facebook, Amazon etc.

Title: Competitive Programming
Description: Learn to write the most efficient programs and get ready for competitions like ACM-ICPC, Google Codejam. Companies like Google, Microsoft, Facebook, Amazon etc hire professionals with exceptional problem solving skills.
Skills: Bit Manipulation, Greedy problems, Dynamic Programming
